General.Name: Limestone Boat Company Ltd
General.Description: The Limestone Boat Company Limited designs, manufactures, and distributes recreational and commercial powerboats. It sells its products under the Limestone, Boca Bay, and Aquasport brands. The company is headquartered in Collingwood, Canada.
General.Address: 65 A Hurontario Street, Collingwood, ON, Canada, L9Y 2L7
